title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds:

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code No code just compiling a dependency ### Meta ``` rustc 1.43.1 (8d69840ab 2020-05-04) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu ``` ### Error output ``` ``` ```shell thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 16432 but the index is 671088641', /rustc/8d69840ab92ea7f4d323420088dd8c9775f180cd/src/libcore/slice/mod.rs:2842:10 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.43.1 (8d69840ab 2020-05-04) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden error: could not compile `futures-util`. ```
Backtrace

``` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name futures_util --edition=2018 /usr/local/cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/futures-util-0.3.5/src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C opt-level=3 --cfg 'feature="alloc"' --cfg 'feature="async-await"' --cfg 'feature="async-await-macro"' --cfg 'feature="channel"' --cfg 'feature="default"' --cfg 'feature="futures-channel"' --cfg 'feature="futures-io"' --cfg 'feature="futures-macro"' --cfg 'feature="futures-sink"' --cfg 'feature="io"' --cfg 'feature="memchr"' --cfg 'feature="proc-macro-hack"' --cfg 'feature="proc-macro-nested"' --cfg 'feature="sink"' --cfg 'feature="slab"' --cfg 'feature="std"' -C metadata=091fb8d26c3147e9 -C extra-filename=-091fb8d26c3147e9 --out-dir /usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps -L dependency=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps --extern futures_channel=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libfutures_channel-139a8383a9352701.rmeta --extern futures_core=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libfutures_core-e92414f31313b5da.rmeta --extern futures_io=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libfutures_io-01046a6fd991cb7f.rmeta --extern futures_macro=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libfutures_macro-77da12e593d5ab9b.so --extern futures_sink=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libfutures_sink-b5082f9624673be5.rmeta --extern futures_task=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libfutures_task-57f9b2c5cd6f91b8.rmeta --extern memchr=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libmemchr-eb1d960a50b55040.rmeta --extern pin_project=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libpin_project-76a658c5d35b5af2.rmeta --extern pin_utils=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libpin_utils-9e43c0275c586811.rmeta --extern proc_macro_hack=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libproc_macro_hack-bb6405456604408a.so --extern proc_macro_nested=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libproc_macro_nested-109f4e316c623bfc.rmeta --extern slab=/usr/src/data-api/target/release/deps/libslab-129325264866ef76.rmeta --cap-lints allow` (signal: 11, SIGSEGV: invalid memory reference) warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: failed to compile `data-api v0.1.0 (/usr/src/data-api)`, intermediate artifacts can be found at `/usr/src/data-api/target` Caused by: build failed ERROR: Service 'app' failed to build: The command '/bin/sh -c cargo install --path .' returned a non-zero code: 101 ```
